page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE OF S.ALLEN
page.content: After waking up,getting washed and dressed is now a formality.When I've read the paper I go outside to exercise my legs.I then come back in totally exhausted and watch television for a while.Later,I go for a bike ride around surrounding countryside.If and when I get back,a cup of coffee is welcome. When I've rested,I go for a swim for a couple of hours and then go home for my tea. My computer helps me to while away the hours until a decent programme comes on the television.I watch television until about half past ten when I retire for the night.
